name: OverbiteFF - Mozilla FTP Directory Style
description: Make gopher://-URLs viewed with OverbiteFF look like FTP directory listings.
additional_info:
Make gopher://-URLs viewed with OverbiteFF look like FTP directory listings. Example URL: gopher://gopher.floodgap.com/1/new I hereby grant all rights I own on this stylesheet to Cameron Kaiser an the other developers from The Overbite Project in the hope that they will implement this as default. Credits
  • JeroenED: Provided fixes for FireFox 29 and added the English and Dutch locale
  • The Mozilla Team: Created the design that this style ist based on
